job_description:
Join us as a Calibration Intern to support the calibration team in daily activities. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting engineers and technicians in performing calibration tasks and basic instrument verification.
2. Operating calibration instruments under supervision and recording measurement data.
3. Preparing equipment before and after use (setup, warm-up, cleaning, storage).
4. Helping maintain calibration tools and ensuring traceability of reference standards.
5. Assisting in handling customer equipment, including receiving and labeling instruments.

This position is ideal for graduates who want hands-on experience in calibration, measurement, and quality processes.
